Ruby development

[edit] Testing

[edit] Using autotest

Autotest is a tool which runs the ruby tests every time a file is saved.

  1. Check out the jonny forms RQ code and run bundle install
  2. In a terminal window enter 
    spork
  3. In a second window enter 
    bundle exec autotest

[edit] Using Growl with autotest

Growl reports autotest results as pop up notifications

  1. Install Growl from here
  2. Open the Growl preferences, go to the Applications tab and enable notifications for autotest
